sentences.en: Any hint of higher inflation will further embolden dollar bulls.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀如出现任何负面消息,都将影响美元的发展.

sentences.en: But at those schools that were having about the test , Atkinson's stance will embolden anti - SAT forces.
sentences.cn: 但在那些已经对SAT三思 的学校中, 艾特金森的表态将使 反 SAT的力量增强了信心.

sentences.en: Emboldened by her smile, he asked her to dance.
sentences.cn: 她的微笑让他鼓起勇气邀请她跳舞。

sentences.en: It can embolden us by giving names to our fears.
sentences.cn: 它能鼓励我们正视并表达我们的忧惧.

sentences.en: The president was steadily emboldened by the discovery that he faced no opposition.
sentences.cn: 发现自己没有受到任何反对，该总统渐渐有了信心。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, being able to pay off victims will embolden muggers.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是能补偿受害人将使凶手更大胆.

trans.tran_cn: 使大胆, 使有胆量, 使勇敢
